FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class NodeProcessor

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Base class for typed node processors with specific input/output types. Provides helper methods for registering ports and managing values.

public abstract class NodeProcessor : INodeProcessor

Registers an input port with a reactive value.
